text.text:
<https://gcc2021.sched.com/event/ihps/americas-session-6|Session 6> starts in 5 mins with these fun talks:

- Galaxy Community Update, Andrew Lonie, Björn Grüning, Anton Nekrutenko, Jeremy Goecks, Dan Blankenberg, Mike Schatz, Enis Afgan
- Modernizing the Galaxy Backend - Data Model, Sergey Golitsynskiy
- Modernizing the Galaxy Backend - Typing and the API, David López
- Modernizing the Galaxy Backend - Typing and Dependency Injection, John Chilton
- Modernizing the Galaxy Backend - A Task Framework, Dannon Baker
- Galaxy for Protected Datasets, Enis Afgan
- Galaxy Language Server - Develop high-quality Galaxy tool wrappers at intergalactic speed, David López
- Galaxy CloudStor Integration - linking national resources for secure data transfer between services, Gareth Price

Captions for individual talks can be accessed with the [CC] icon on the video.
